name: update-manifest
description: Task to update one or more XML tags inside manifest file.
author: Mathivanan Palanisamy

inputs.name: nodeToUpdate
inputs.label: Node inside manifest file to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Node in manifest for which the value need to be updated.

inputs.name: isVersion
inputs.label: Is it a version to update?
inputs.helpMarkDown: If it's a version to update, the task can be used to auto-increment it. **Version format:** *major.minor.build.revision*

inputs.name: versionPart
inputs.label: Part of the version to increment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Part of the version that needs to be incremented.

inputs.name: valueToUpdate
inputs.label: Value to update in node
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value that needs to be updated inside the tag.
